{{page.title}}

提供类 Sass 的基础语法功能（非全部），包括变量、逻辑、循环、Mixins、Extends、Imports等

但要注意的是，部分的语法与原生的 Sass 语法略有差别。

Plugin documentation

Variables

{% highlight css %} $blue: #056ef0; $column: 200px; .menu { width: calc(4 * $column); } .menu_link { background: $blue; width: $column; } /* after */ .menu { width: calc(4 * 200px); } .menu_link { background: #056ef0; width: 200px; } {% endhighlight %}

Conditionals

{% highlight css %} /* before */ .notice--clear { @if 3 < 5 { background: green; } @else { background: blue; } } /* after */ .notice--clear { background: green; } {% endhighlight %}

Loops

{% highlight css %} /* before */ @for $i from 1 to 3 { .b-$i { width: $(i)px; } } /* after */ .b-1 { width: 1px } .b-2 { width: 2px } .b-3 { width: 3px } {% endhighlight %}

Mixins

{% highlight css %} /* before */ @define-mixin icon $name { padding-left: 16px; &::after { content: ""; background-url: url(/icons/$(name).png); } } .search { @mixin icon search; } /* after */ .search { padding-left: 16px; } .search::after { content: ""; background-url: url(/icons/search.png); } {% endhighlight %}

Extends

{% highlight css %} /* before */ @define-extend bg-green { background: green; } .notice--clear { @extend bg-green; } /* after */ .notice--clear { background: green; } {% endhighlight %}

Imports

{% highlight css %} /* Before */ @import "partials/base"; /* Contents of partials/_base.css: `body { background: black; }` */ /* After */ body { background: black; } {% endhighlight %}

Property Lookup

{% highlight css %} /* Before */ .heading { margin: 20px; padding: @margin; } /* After */ .heading { margin: 20px; padding: 20px; } {% endhighlight %}
